practice_problems.description: Write a function to add two numbers
practice_problems.solution: function add(a, b) { return a + b; }

practice_problems.description: Write a function to multiply two numbers
practice_problems.solution: function multiply(a, b) { return a * b; }

test_problems.description: Write a function to subtract two numbers
test_problems.solution: function subtract(a, b) { return a - b; }

test_problems.description: Write a function to divide two numbers
test_problems.solution: function divide(a, b) { return a / b; }
